text: Bulbine francescae is a species of plant in the genus Bulbine. It is endemic to Namibia. Its natural habitat is rocky areas. ==References== * Loots, S. & Craven, P. 2004. Bulbine francescae. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. Category:Flora of Namibia francescae Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Bulbine francescae
